english_example_sentence: You don't need to apologize for that small, silly mistake.
russian_example_sentence: Тебе не нужно извиняться за эту маленькую глупую ошибку.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen o küçük, aptalca hata için özür dilememen lazım.
